Text: Works! I did find that I had to completely remove any previous version before installing.
Works great.  Found a file my Symantec Endpoint Protection missed.  I actually got version 4.46 you uploaded earlier, but it updated to 4.47 with no problems.  Thanks.

It works for me finally. I got the 'program not installed' message in the patcher. It didn't work until after I used the old patcher. Even then it only patched the file, and SAS still said 'trial version'. So I entered the reg number and activation code manually. Im on windows 7 x64 if it helps.

Isn't any Crack in the file only the patch and program.
